name: AI Startup Interest Configuration
description: Interest levels optimized for AI/ML startups monitoring competitors

critical.label: Critical - Game Changer
criteria: Achieves SOTA on benchmarks we target
Exclusive partnership with OpenAI/Anthropic/Google
Gets exclusive access to compute or datasets
Hires away our key researchers
Claims breakthrough in our problem domain
Launches direct competitor to our product
Open sources model that makes ours obsolete
Secures deal with our target enterprise customer
Gets acquired by major tech company
Achieves viral adoption (1M+ users in a month)

high.label: High - Strategic Move
criteria: Releases new model with better benchmarks
Announces compute partnership or GPU access
Launches developer API or SDK
Publishes influential research paper
Gets into YC/major accelerator
Hires prominent AI researcher
Launches on Product Hunt with #1
Announces enterprise features
Partners with cloud provider
Releases training dataset

ecosystem_influence.description: Impact on AI/ML ecosystem and community

resource_advantage.description: Access to compute, data, or talent
